00018 // Message box for midas routines
00019 
00020 int MidasMessage(const char *str)
00021 {
00022 char name[80];
00023 
00024   cm_get_client_info(name);
00025   MessageBox(GetFocus(), str, name, MB_OK);
00026   return 0;
00027 }
00028 
00030 // Timer callback for cm_yield
00031 
00032 void CALLBACK EXPORT TimerProc(HWND hWnd,UINT nMsg,UINT nIDEvent,DWORD dwTime)
00033 {
00034 int   status;
00035 CWnd* pWnd;
00036 
00037   pWnd = AfxGetMainWnd();
00038 
00039   pWnd->KillTimer(1175);
00040 
00041   status = cm_yield(0);
00042 
00043   if (status == SS_ABORT || status == RPC_SHUTDOWN)
00044     {
00045     pWnd->PostMessage(WM_CLOSE, 0, 0);
00046     return;
00047     }
00048 
00049   if (!pWnd->SetTimer(1175, 100, TimerProc))
00050     pWnd->MessageBox("Cannot set timer");
00051 }
00052 
00054 // callback for password query
00055 
00056 void GetPassword(char *password)
00057 {
00058 CMPasswdDlg passwddlg;
00059   
00060   if (passwddlg.DoModal() == IDCANCEL)
00061     {
00062     password[0] = 0;
00063     return;
00064     }
00065 
00066   strcpy(password, passwddlg.m_strPassword);
00067 
00068   return;
00069 }

00074 BOOL CMExperiment::HostDlg()
00075 {
00076 CMHostDlg hostdlg;
00077   
00078   hostdlg.m_strHostName = m_strHostName;
00079 
00080   if (hostdlg.DoModal() == IDCANCEL)
00081     return FALSE;
00082 
00083   m_strHostName = hostdlg.m_strHostName;
00084   m_strExperimentName = hostdlg.m_strExperimentName;
00085 
00086   return TRUE;
00087 }

00089 BOOL CMExperiment::Connect(CString strHostName, CString strExperimentName, CString strClientName)
00090 {
00091 int   status;
00092 char  expts[MAX_EXPERIMENT][NAME_LENGTH];
00093 
00094   m_strHostName = strHostName;
00095   m_strExperimentName = strExperimentName;
00096   m_strClientName = strClientName;
00097   m_bConnected = FALSE;
00098   m_bTimerStarted = FALSE;
00099   m_pWnd = NULL;
00100 
00101   // start host dialog if more than one experiment defined
00102   if (m_strExperimentName == "")
00103     {
00104     status = cm_list_experiments((char *) (LPCTSTR) strHostName, expts);
00105     if (status != CM_SUCCESS)
00106       {
00107       char str[256];
00108 
00109       cm_get_error(status, str);
00110       MidasMessage(str);
00111     
00112       if (!HostDlg())
00113         return FALSE;
00114       }
00115     else
00116       {
00117       // select experiment if more than one
00118       if (expts[1][0])
00119         if (!HostDlg())
00120           return FALSE;
00121       }
00122     }
00123 
00124   // try to connect to midas host
00125   do
00126     {
00127     status = cm_connect_experiment1((char *)(LPCTSTR)m_strHostName, 
00128                                     (char *)(LPCTSTR)m_strExperimentName, 
00129                                     (char *)(LPCTSTR)m_strClientName, GetPassword,
00130                                     DEFAULT_ODB_SIZE, 20000); /* increased timeout for W95 */
00131     
00132     if (status == CM_WRONG_PASSWORD)
00133       {
00134       MidasMessage("Password is incorrect");
00135       return FALSE;
00136       }
00137 
00138     if (status != CM_SUCCESS)
00139       {
00140       char str[256];
00141 
00142       cm_get_error(status, str);
00143       MidasMessage(str);
00144     
00145       if (!HostDlg())
00146         return FALSE;
00147       }
00148 
00149     } while (status != CM_SUCCESS);
00150 
00151   // disable watchdog during debugging
00152 #ifdef _DEBUG
00153   cm_set_watchdog_params(TRUE, 0);
00154 #endif
00155 
00156   // route all messages to MidasMessage
00157   cm_set_msg_print(MT_ALL, MT_ALL, MidasMessage);
00158 
00159   // get handle to ODB
00160   cm_get_experiment_database(&m_hDB, NULL);
00161 
00162   // set connected flag
00163   m_bConnected = TRUE;
00164 
00165   return TRUE;
00166 }
00167 
00168 BOOL CMExperiment::StartTimer()
00169 {
00170   if (m_bTimerStarted)
00171     return TRUE;
00172 
00173   // remember window
00174   m_pWnd = AfxGetMainWnd();
00175   if (!m_pWnd)
00176     return FALSE;
00177 
00178   // start timer to call cm_yield
00179   if (!m_pWnd->SetTimer(1175, 500, TimerProc))
00180     {
00181     MidasMessage("Cannot set timer");
00182     return FALSE;
00183     }
00184 
00185   m_bTimerStarted = TRUE;
00186 
00187   return TRUE;
00188 }

00190 CMExperiment::CMExperiment(CString strClientName)
00191 {
00192   // Set empty strings
00193   m_strHostName =       "";
00194   m_strExperimentName = "";
00195 
00196   Connect(m_strHostName, m_strExperimentName, strClientName);
00197 }
00198 
00199 CMExperiment::CMExperiment(CString strCmdLine, CString strClientName)
00200 {
00201 char *token;
00202 
00203   // Set empty strings
00204   m_strHostName =       "";
00205   m_strExperimentName = "";
00206 
00207   // Overwrite with command line parameters
00208   token = strtok((char *) strCmdLine.GetBuffer(80), " ");
00209   while (token != NULL)
00210     {
00211     if (token[0] == '-')
00212       {
00213       if (token[1] == 'e')
00214         m_strExperimentName = strtok(NULL, " ");
00215       else if (token[1] == 'h')
00216         m_strHostName = strtok(NULL, " ");
00217       }
00218     token = strtok(NULL, " ");
00219     }
00220 
00221   Connect(m_strHostName, m_strExperimentName, strClientName);
00222 }
00223 
00224 CMExperiment::~CMExperiment()
00225 {
00226   // remove message dispatcher
00227   cm_set_msg_print(MT_ALL, MT_ALL, NULL);
00228 
00229   // Disconnect from MIDAS host
00230   if (m_bConnected)
00231     cm_disconnect_experiment();
00232 }
